text: qal abn nwh: salja 'iilaa jabal athssan bih min alma', fymneny min alghrq, fajabh nwh: la mane alyawm min 'amr allah wqdayh aldhy qad nazal bialkhalq min algharaq walhlak 'iilaa man rahimah allah teala, famin warkb fi alsafinat mena, wahal almawj almrtfe bayn nuh wabnh, fakan min almughraqin alhalkyn
